sentences: The Dialogue focus on the Secretariat report on the role of finance and investment flows stimulated a number of conversations in the corridors.
Some observers were impressed by the delegates thoughtful responses to the study.
Many viewed the exchanges as a foretaste of things to come, with finance and trade ministries being targeted by the Government of Indonesia for high-level sessions parallel to COP 13.

While discussions on investment invited familiar developing country concerns about the risks of relying too heavily on flows of private investment, delegates were also in a self-congratulatory mood as they recognized that the detailed discussion had opened a new and important door in the process.
Informal discussions and bilaterals, involving delegations and NGO representatives, took place in advance of Wednesday contact group meeting to be convened by the chair of the AWG .
Delegates were reported to be working on a draft text during informals Tuesday evening.
enb_long_title: Vienna Climate Change Talks 2007 - AWG 4 and the Dialogue 4
